high_level_findings: Capability checks rely on opener credentials, enabling mark/timestamp operations or privileged behavior when sockets are passed across namespaces
Memory allocation knobs (bypass_prot_mem, SOCK_MEMALLOC, high-order frags) allow unbounded resource use or pressure evasion that can starve the system
RCU-deferred destruction, reuseport detachment, and backlog processing leave windows for use-after-free and refcount inconsistencies under concurrency
